tags.description: Admin APIs for managing merchant API keys

tags.description: Provides configuration data for Admin UI

put.description: Updates an existing user with the given UID. For MERCHANT_USER accounts, associatedMerchantId must reference a sub-merchant.
Updates the status of a transaction.

get.description: Returns a payment gateway by its database ID.

put.description: Updates an existing payment gateway by its database ID.

get.description: Fetch a payment channel by its unique UID.

put.description: Updates mutable details of a payment channel by UID. Channel code remains immutable and cannot be changed.

get.description: Returns a merchant by its unique UID.

put.description: Updates an existing merchant by UID.

delete.description: Deletes a merchant by its database ID.

put.description: Updates metadata for an existing gateway-channel mapping.
Updates the status of a disbursement.

post.description: Processes disbursement callback from AzamPay
Processes checkout callback from AzamPay
Allows admins to reset passwords for any user.
Logs out the authenticated user.
Authenticates the user and returns a JWT token.
Allows any authenticated user to change their password. Users must provide their current password and a valid new password that meets security requirements.

400.description: Invalid request - current password incorrect, passwords don't match, or new password doesn't meet requirements

get.description: Returns a paginated list of users.

post.description: Creates a new user in the system [Default password:Mn8@Rk5$Lp2x]. Requests using user type ROOT_USER are rejected. When using user type MERCHANT_USER, you must supply associatedMerchantId for a sub-merchant.
Unlocks a user account, restoring login access. Administrators cannot target their own accounts or the root account.
Assign new roles to a user. Administrators cannot use this endpoint on their own accounts or the root account.

delete.description: Remove roles from a user. Administrators cannot use this endpoint on their own accounts or the root account.

post.description: Resets a user's password and generates a new secure one. Self-resets via this endpoint are blocked, and the root account is immutable.
Locks a user account, preventing login until unlocked. Administrators cannot target their own accounts or the root account.
Manually update last login timestamp for a user.
Deactivates a user account by setting its status to inactive. Administrators cannot target their own accounts or the root account.
Activates a user account by setting its status to active. Administrators cannot target their own accounts or the root account.
Allows the logged-in user to change their password.
Retries a failed transaction.
Refunds a transaction with specified amount and reason.
Marks a transaction as completed.
Cancels a transaction with a reason.
Generates a summary of transactions based on criteria.
Processes and marks stale transactions as failed.
Search transactions using advanced criteria.
Exports transactions to Excel format.
Exports transactions to CSV format.
Archives transactions older than the specified threshold.
Creates a new user in the system [Default password:Mn8@Rk5$Lp2x]

get.description: Returns a paginated list of payment gateways.

post.description: Creates a new payment gateway in the system.
Deactivates a payment gateway by its UID.
Activates a payment gateway by its UID.

post.summary: Assign payment channel to payment gateway
post.description: Links a payment channel to a payment gateway with payCode and provider metadata.

201.description: Payment channel assigned to gateway successfully

get.description: Returns a paginated list of payment channels.

post.description: Creates a new payment channel in the system.
Deactivates a payment channel by setting its status to inactive.
Activates a payment channel by setting its status to active.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of merchants.

post.description: Creates a new merchant in the system.
Records an approval or rejection for the merchant KYC workflow.

get.description: Returns settlement bank accounts configured for the merchant.

post.description: Adds or updates a settlement bank account for the merchant.

get.description: Retrieves all API keys belonging to the merchant

post.description: Issues a new API key + secret for the merchant
Deactivates a specific gateway-channel mapping.
Activates a specific gateway-channel mapping.
Assigns a payment channel to a payment gateway with payCode and provider details.
Retries a failed disbursement.
Marks a disbursement as completed.
Cancels a disbursement with a reason.
Retries a disbursement by ID regardless of its status (admin only).
Generates a summary of disbursements based on criteria.
Processes and marks stale disbursements as failed.
Search disbursements using advanced criteria.
Exports disbursements to Excel format.
Exports disbursements to CSV format.
Archives disbursements older than the specified threshold.

patch.description: Transitions a merchant between lifecycle statuses (e.g. ACTIVE, SUSPENDED, INACTIVE).
Assigns or removes a parent merchant relationship.

get.description: Returns a user by numeric ID; new integrations should call the UID endpoint instead.

delete.description: Soft-deletes a user by ID, marking them as deleted instead of removing them permanently. Administrators cannot soft-delete their own accounts or the root account.

get.description: Returns a user by their unique UID.
Search users by username, email, or role.
Get total number of registered users.
Returns a paginated list of all transactions.
Returns a transaction by its database ID.
Returns the processing history for a transaction.

get.summary: Check if transaction can be updated
get.description: Checks if a transaction can be updated.
Returns the audit trail for a transaction.
Returns a transaction by its internal transaction ID.
Returns transactions filtered by status.
Generates transaction volume statistics.
Generates transaction statistics grouped by status.

200.description: Transaction stats by status generated successfully

get.description: Generates transaction statistics grouped by payment gateway.

200.description: Transaction stats by gateway generated successfully

get.description: Generates daily transaction statistics.
Returns transactions that are considered stale.
Returns all pending transactions.
Returns a transaction by its merchant transaction ID.
Generates a summary of transactions for a specific merchant.
Returns all transactions for a specific merchant.
Returns transactions for a specific payment gateway.
Returns all failed transactions.
Checks if a transaction exists by internal ID.
Returns transactions within a specific date range.
Returns the count of transactions with a specific status.

get.summary: Get AzamPay transaction status. This is temporary, just foe testing
get.description: Fetches transaction status from AzamPay using externalReferenceId and bankName
Returns the total amount of transactions with a specific status.
Returns transactions within a specific amount range.
Returns a paginated list of roles.
Returns a role by its ID.

get.summary: Get roles allowed for a user type
get.description: Returns only the roles permitted for the supplied user type.
Returns a role by its name (enum value).
Returns all roles without pagination. For Assignment purposes
Returns a payment gateway by its unique UID.
Returns a list of all payment gateways without pagination.
Fetch a payment channel by its database ID.
Returns the total number of payment channels registered in the system.
Returns a full list of all payment channels without pagination.
Returns a merchant by its database ID.
Returns all sub-merchants linked to the given parent merchant.
Returns aggregated transaction and disbursement metrics for the merchant.
Returns lightweight merchant records for search/autocomplete workflows.
Returns the total number of merchants in the system.
Returns all channels linked to a given payment gateway in a paginated format.
Returns the total number of payment gateway-channel mappings in the system.
Returns a paginated list of all disbursements.
Returns the processing history for a disbursement.

get.summary: Check if disbursement can be updated
get.description: Checks if a disbursement can be updated.
Returns the audit trail for a disbursement.
Returns a disbursement by its database ID.
Returns disbursements for a specific transaction.
Returns disbursements filtered by status.
Generates disbursement volume statistics.
Generates disbursement statistics grouped by status.

200.description: Disbursement stats by status generated successfully

get.description: Generates disbursement statistics grouped by payment gateway.

200.description: Disbursement stats by gateway generated successfully

get.description: Generates daily disbursement statistics.
Returns disbursements that are considered stale.
Returns all pending disbursements.
Generates a summary of disbursements for a specific merchant.
Returns all disbursements for a specific merchant.
Returns disbursements for a specific payment gateway.
Returns all failed disbursements.
Returns a disbursement by its external transaction ID.
Checks if a disbursement exists by external ID.
Returns disbursements within a specific date range.
Returns the count of disbursements with a specific status.
Returns the total amount of disbursements with a specific status.
Returns disbursements within a specific amount range.
Returns context-aware dashboard statistics based on user type and roles. Merchant users see only their merchant's data, system users see scoped data.
Returns the dashboard context for the current user, including access level, allowed features, and merchant association.
Provides static configuration values (enums, types) needed by the Admin UI.

delete.description: Marks a settlement bank account as inactive for the merchant.
Revokes a merchant API key, disabling its use

UpdateUserRequestDto.description: Request object for updating a user

roles.description: List of roles assigned to the user

associatedMerchantId.description: UID of the sub-merchant associated with the user. For MERCHANT_USER accounts this is required when updating.

uid.description: ULID representation of the user id

roles.description: List of role codes assigned to the user

associatedMerchantId.description: UID of the sub-merchant linked to this user (if any)

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the user was created

apiKey.description: API key for authenticating with the external gateway.

secretKey.description: Secret key used for securing requests.

UpdatePaymentGatewayRequestDto.description: DTO for updating an existing external payment gateway configuration. Supports partial updates of core metadata, URLs, supported methods, and security credentials.

name.description: Full name of the payment gateway provider.

credentials.description: Credentials required to access the gateway securely.

supportedMethods.description: Supported payment methods like MNO, CARD, BANK_TRANSFER.

PaymentGatewayResponseDto.description: Detailed response DTO representing a registered external payment gateway.

id.description: Internal database ID of the payment gateway.

code.description: Unique short code used to identify the payment gateway.

name.description: Human-readable name of the payment gateway.

productionApiBaseUrl.description: Base URL for production environment requests.

activeStatus.description: Indicates whether this payment gateway is currently active.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the payment gateway was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the payment gateway was last updated.

UpdatePaymentChannelRequestDto.description: Request payload for updating an existing payment channel. The channel code is immutable and cannot be changed once created.

name.description: Updated descriptive name of the payment channel. Example: 'M-Pesa'

paymentChannelType.description: Updated type of the payment channel. Accepted values: MNO, BANK, CARD, WALLET, etc.

PaymentChannelResponseDto.description: Represents a response payload for a payment channel entity.

id.description: Database ID of the payment channel

uid.description: Globally unique identifier (ULID) of the payment channel

code.description: Unique short code of the payment channel

name.description: Human-readable name of the payment channel

paymentChannelType.description: Type of payment channel (e.g., MNO, BANK, CARD)

isActive.description: Flag indicating whether the channel is active and usable

createdAt.description: ISO-8601 timestamp when the payment channel was created

updatedAt.description: ISO-8601 timestamp when the payment channel was last updated

UpdateMerchantRequestDto.description: Request object to update an existing merchant, including hierarchy and business details.

singleTransactionLimit.description: Optional limit for a single transaction

dailyTransactionLimit.description: Optional limit for daily transaction volume

monthlyTransactionLimit.description: Optional limit for monthly transaction volume

MerchantResponseDto.description: Response object representing a registered merchant, including profile, verification and hierarchy details.

name.description: Merchant name used in listings or receipts

businessCity.description: City in which the business operates

businessState.description: State or region of the business

businessPostalCode.description: Postal code of the business address

businessCountry.description: Country where the business is registered

statusReason.description: Optional reason for the current status

kycVerified.description: Indicates whether the merchant has passed KYC verification

kycNotes.description: Optional notes recorded during the latest KYC decision

kycVerifiedAt.description: Date and time when KYC verification completed

kycVerifiedBy.description: User who performed the latest KYC verification

singleTransactionLimit.description: Single transaction limit configured for the merchant

dailyTransactionLimit.description: Daily transaction limit configured for the merchant

monthlyTransactionLimit.description: Monthly transaction limit configured for the merchant

parentMerchantUid.description: Parent merchant UID (if this is a submerchant)

UpdateGatewayChannelRequestDto.description: Request DTO for updating an existing gateway-channel mapping

isActive.description: Whether the mapping is active or inactive

PaymentGatewayChannelResponseDto.description: Response object for a payment gatewaychannel mapping

id.description: ID of the Payment Gateway Channel (DB ID)

paymentGatewayId.description: ID of the associated payment gateway

paymentGatewayUid.description: UID of the associated payment gateway

paymentChannelId.description: ID of the associated payment channel

paymentChannelUid.description: UID of the associated payment channel

paymentChannelCode.description: Unique code of the associated payment channel

paymentChannelName.description: Unique name of the associated payment channel

payCode.description: Pay code used in the mapping

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the mapping was created

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the mapping was last updated

AuthResponseDto.description: Authentication response payload including token and user details.

CreateUserRequestDto.description: Payload for creating a new system user

roleNames.description: List of role names to assign to the user

associatedMerchantId.description: UID of the associated sub-merchant (required for MERCHANT_USER accounts)

CreatePaymentGatewayRequestDto.description: DTO for registering a new external payment gateway. Requires gateway identification, base URLs, authentication credentials, and supported payment methods.

code.description: Unique short identifier for the payment gateway.

name.description: Full name of the payment gateway provider.

supportedMethods.description: Supported payment methods like MNO, CARD, BANK_TRANSFER.

AssignChannelToGatewayRequestDto.description: Request object for assigning a payment channel to a payment gateway

payCode.description: Payment code used by the provider

CreatePaymentChannelRequestDto.description: Request payload for creating a new payment channel (e.g., M-Pesa, CRDB Bank). Includes identifiers and the channel type.

code.description: Unique short identifier for the payment channel, e.g., 'MPESA', 'CRDB'

name.description: Descriptive display name of the payment channel, e.g., 'M-Pesa', 'CRDB Bank'

paymentChannelType.description: Type of payment channel, such as MNO (mobile network operator), BANK, CARD, WALLET

CreateMerchantRequestDto.description: Request object to create a new merchant, including hierarchy and business details.

merchantCode.description: Unique merchant code for internal reference

businessCity.description: City where the business is located

businessState.description: State or region of the business

businessPostalCode.description: Postal code for the business address

merchantRole.description: Role of the merchant (PLATFORM or SUBMERCHANT). If not set, defaults to SUBMERCHANT

parentMerchantId.description: ID of the parent merchant (only required for SUBMERCHANT)

singleTransactionLimit.description: Optional limit for a single transaction

dailyTransactionLimit.description: Optional limit for daily transaction volume

monthlyTransactionLimit.description: Optional limit for monthly transaction volume

MerchantKycDecisionRequestDto.description: Represents a compliance decision captured during the merchant KYC process.

status.description: New KYC status for the merchant

notes.description: Optional notes captured by the compliance analyst

MerchantBankAccountRequestDto.description: Payload for creating or updating a merchant bank account configuration.

bankAccountUid.description: Existing bank account UID when performing an update

primary.description: Flag the account as the primary settlement account

notes.description: Optional notes for internal compliance or settlement teams

MerchantBankAccountResponseDto.description: View model for a merchant bank account.

MerchantApiKeyCreateRequestDto.description: Optional parameters for issuing a merchant API key

validityDays.description: Optional custom validity window in days (defaults to 365)

MerchantApiKeyResponseDto.description: Contains API key credentials issued to a merchant

apiKey.description: Public API key identifier (used in request headers)

secretKey.description: Secret part of the API key (returned only at creation time)

expiresAt.description: Expiration timestamp of the API key

status.description: Current status of the API key

MerchantStatusUpdateRequestDto.description: Payload used to transition a merchant between lifecycle statuses.

status.description: Target status to apply to the merchant

reason.description: Optional reason for the status change

MerchantParentAssignmentRequestDto.description: Request payload for assigning or removing a parent merchant relationship.

parentMerchantUid.description: UID of the parent merchant. Omit or set to null to detach the current parent.

MerchantActivitySummaryDto.description: Aggregated operational metrics for a merchant.

totalDisbursements.description: Total disbursement count associated with the merchant

lastTransactionAt.description: Timestamp of the most recent transaction in ISO-8601 format

MerchantLookupResponseDto.description: Lightweight merchant projection for lookup/autocomplete workflows

PagedMetaResponseWrapperMerchantLookupRe.description: Paginated response wrapper with metadata block

userType.description: Enum representing the global classification of system users
